content: s azra love lamb by halime özel @handmade_by_halime dear crochet lover much love time and effort have been put into designing this amigurumi and i would appreciate if you please give credit to me and add the following note to your item pattern by @handmade_by_halime this pattern is for free but that still means that you can not publish this pattern in any social media channel and youtube even if it s for free and you tagged me the pattern should only be available in my ravelry account that you can not mass-produce it and sell it in stores it is for personal use only that you can not reproduce the pattern and sell it as your own that you can not alternate some parts and because of that claim it as your pattern and publish it you can not translate to other language and publish it on your social media i m more than happy if you as a private person to gift or sell any items made from this pattern but always credit me as the designer please follow these simple steps as respect to me as the designer i give away this pattern for free but i still own the copyrights for it happy crocheting with love and respect halime abbreviations slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain/s single_crochet single_crochet increase increase crochet 2 single_crochet in the same stitch decrease decrease crochet 2 single_crochet together bobble bobble stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet st stitch es round round s … x x r epeat instructions in brackets x times total number of stitches in the round dear materials required yarn i used medium weight 4 ply cotton yarn drops safran but any yarn of your choice will work crochet lover crochet hook 2 0 or any of your choice fibrefill / toy stuffing thank you so much for purchasing the pattern of azra s love lamb security eyes 6 mm i hope that you will enjoy crochet her as much as i loved designing her stitch markers scissor and needle much love time and effort have been put into designing this amigurumi creation size and i would appreciate if you do not share this pdf reproduce alterate or sell this approx 12 cm when using drops safran pattern either in its entirety or in parts this pattern is for personal use only and 2 0 mm crochet hook i would love to see your finished creation so please give credit to me and add following note to your item pattern by @handmade_by_halime additional information pattern is written in us crochet terms i m more than happy for you to gift or sell any items made from this pattern but would love if you could credit me as a designer i recommend to look/read through the whole pattern before you start never hesitate to contact me through my instagram account or etsy shop and think about the environment and don t i will do my best to help you print out if
